üí¨ Test AI Conversation (Text)

ü§ñ

AI Chat Not Available

The AI conversation feature is currently disabled or Ollama is not running.

To enable AI chat:

  1. Ensure Ollama container is running
  2. Pull the model: docker exec german_ollama ollama pull mistral:7b
  3. Set ENABLE_AI_CONVERSATION=true in .env
  4. Restart the backend

üé§ Test Voice Conversation

üí° Testing Tips

  • ‚Ä¢ Green status: Service is running and available
  • ‚Ä¢ Red status: Service is unavailable or not configured
  • ‚Ä¢ Test conversation: Try "Hallo! Wie geht es dir?"
  • ‚Ä¢ Check features: Ensure required features are enabled in backend .env
  • ‚Ä¢ Troubleshooting: If services are down, check Docker containers
